extendedInfo.description: xWriter 4 is one of a kind - powerful editor enables users to write customizable multi-page notes.It is simple, clean, neatly organized, lightweight, yet powerful word processor designed for both tablets and phones.Please note that this is free version and has the following constraints- Number of notes are constrained to three- Does not support export feature- Only allowed to view txt files.POWERFUL EDITORWork with smooth scrolling pages with font, keyboard, and many other options!EXPORT AND SHARE SEAMLESSLYThe app supports browser for My notes, SD card, External SD card, My Document, and Box - copy and paste among storages seamlessly.INTUITIVE INTERFACEAlmost every edit options can be changed in the editor â no switching back and forth to settings screen. For fast navigation and operation, on-screen toolbars are provided.GET ORGANIZEDOrganize documents in your own way. Make different styles of folders and move your notes, or you can make copy of your notes.SECURE YOUR DATAThe app offers backup and restore feature. Use password protection to keep your note safe.Some of the xWriter features include:Main1) Browse and edit from My Notes, SD card, External SD card, My Document, and Box2) Folder - create unlimited depth of folders, you can delete/rename folders and move notes to folder3) Folder style - 9 different folder styles to choose from4) Search notes - search your notes in specific folder5) Share document6) Export as txt or pdf7) PDF export options - page size(A4, A3, etc), page margins (narrow, wide, etc), print page number, text color, background color, password encryption and moreEditor1) Fast touch interaction through its own gesture engine2) Toolbar for save, select all, cut, copy, paste, undo/redo, page up/down/begin/end, and page next/prev/first/last3) Unique background, font, text size, page margin, and line spacing settings for each note4) 10+ different note styles to choose from5) Pages - add pages to your note and flip pages by swipe gesture or toolbar buttons6) Page thumbnail view and manipulation - insert/delete/merge/add pages7) undo & redo8) Text search - search for characters up/down with case sensitive search option9) Fonts â in addition to sans serif, monospace, and serif, it supports arial, courier, times, georgia, and verdana only if installed in your device10) Keyboard - capitalize all/sentence/word options, and enable suggestions11) Auto save - choose to save automatically or not12) Word Count13) Text selection (double tap or long press to select a word)14) Insert page, delete page, insert page break, merge pagesItâs is compatible with android devices with version 2.2+ including tablets and phones such as Samsung Galaxy Tab, Galaxy Note, Asus Transformer, Acer Picasso, Acer Iconia, Galaxy Nexus, Galaxy S2, S3, S4, Optimus G Pro, etc.

reviews.title: Very good but needs a widget
reviews.comment: Best word processor I have found on play store but only 4 star, 5 if there was a widget.
reviews.author: Kyle Russell

reviews.title: dave goddard
reviews.comment: Complete waste of time, just an empty ad for the paid version. Though constraints are listed they should just say you can do nothing with it. Even when you pay for the pro version you still can\'t get to your files from the free version. Support does not exist! There are other text editors out there just as good (or better) whose developers are not just after your money.
reviews.author: Dave Goddard

reviews.title: I\'m happy
reviews.comment: BEST app of its type
reviews.author: Catherine Sarah Hooper

reviews.title: Nyce App
reviews.comment: Really nyce a gd app thanks
reviews.author: Tamim Omary

reviews.comment: Was a great app till the update now all seting are mad and I can add to my or start a new one . So I loose all my work not good.
reviews.author: Kam Mock

reviews.title: By far the best...
reviews.comment: As a writer and novelist on the go this is, by far, the best app I have had the privilege and pleasure of using. All the functionality  one would require to write comes complete within this one app.   The developer has also assured me many more features are quickly coming. Many thanks.
reviews.author: Butch Yenter

reviews.title: Like it!
reviews.comment: Good app but would like better if I could change text color for individual words or paragraphs. Also would like to make list and have option to rearrange as alphabetical or sequential order. Overall is great app though. Maybe can add my suggestions to update or make plugins.
reviews.author: chris Russell

reviews.title: Looks awesome, BUT...
reviews.comment: What in the ever loving heck is up with the word wrap? Pasted my current WIP into here to give it a run before I shelled out for the full version, and the entire doc (just a wee one, 300 words) is on one line! Is this fixed in the full version? Do I risk it? I\'m nervous. Come on, devs, this is ridiculous. Return key does nothing. Impossible to find the end of my doc and continue writing. I need basic formatting in the documents I export, I haven\'t got time to faff about fixing paragraphs afterwards. Grr.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Just purchased the full version. Just one request to make this the best app of its kind. Can we get some type of sync option where it syncs across several device. I would love to have the ability to start a file on my tablet and then be able to pull it up on my phone to add to it. That would make this a killer app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Writing App!
reviews.comment: I am really amazed with this application. Coming from a writer who can be picky about customisation, this application is a dream. Word count is a must and I adore the folders, font options, and paper layouts.  Would pay for this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It was very good at first, but it only allows you to write 3chapters then makes you buy the full version. I feell betrayed as I was getting use to it. Im uninstalling it now.
reviews.author: Gwendelynn Albuquerque

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: Highly recommend to download it! Much better than other story writing apps. It\'s fantastic as a free app. What more with the paid version?
reviews.author: Jamie M

reviews.title: It\'s ok, but...
reviews.comment: I get this is free version, but can you at least make it 5 notes?!
reviews.author: Hikari Purinsu Jemuzu

reviews.title: Looks great
reviews.comment: As things go this is a really promising app, but I have problems with the word wrap. The writing doesn\'t wrap in edit view. It just keeps on going..  So I can\'t really do much with it right now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An excellant app
reviews.comment: With highly thanks for whom created
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: ive just started writing a blog so this is so handy for me to write my drafts in i love the folder option too
reviews.author: Victoria Cottam

reviews.title: No spell checker
reviews.comment: Ok up to a point .... but no use without a spell checker
reviews.author: Peter Cheshire

reviews.title: Question
reviews.comment: Is there anyway to get your writen work onto an email if that is possible i will put it up to 5stars. Please respond
reviews.author: Zach Saunders

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: To me, this is a great app!
reviews.author: Yailen Alonso

reviews.title: EZ, Reliable, Best Total Feature Set 4Me
reviews.comment: Using this smoothly for > 1 Mo. The combination of note taking & folder organizing & Dropbox is perfect for my typical purposes. #RECOMMENDED# -seems unique among note apps- (Phone User Tip: I use the condensed view seen in the 2nd-to-last preview: better for small screens than the larger manila folders view)
reviews.author: Vector Keene
